lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Many a tear have to fall
But it's all in the game
All in the wonderful game
That we know as love

[Verse 2]
You have words with him
And your future's looking dim
But these things
Your hearts can rise, rise above above

[Verse 3]
Once in a while he will call
But it's all in the game
Soon he'll be there at your side
With a sweet, a sweet bouquet
With a sweet bouquet

[Chorus]
And he'll kiss your lips
And caress your waiting fingertips
And your heart, your hearts got to fly fly
Fly way

[Chorus]
And he'll kiss your lips
And caress your waiting fingertips
And your heart, your hearts got to fly away

[Outro]
It's all in the game, the game called love
It's all in the game, the game called love
